title: [Large-Scale] Fieldwork-Based Mobile Microlearning Internship for Enhancing Leadership Competencies of Science Sector Managers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theory and management experience
context.additional_context: Learners, as corporate managers/leaders, engage in field practice in scientific domains alongside mobile learning, with a flexible learning environment facilitated by digital devices.

learning_goals: Leadership and decision-making processes in scientific research settings can be analyzed and applied with over 80% accuracy
Learners complete fieldwork-linked learning content via mobile platforms at least three times weekly and apply it to practical problems
Job-related problem-solving skills can be improved by 30% within six months through formative assessments (quizzes, practical reports, peer evaluations)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
